entries.content:
# 2026-02-22 (Saturday)

## Evening Session with Brit (~9-11 PM PT)
- Darryl uploaded multiple PDFs and documents for Brit to review
- Discussed Revaly identity and positioning strategy
- Dan wants to get involved — exploring collaboration angles
- Key takeaway: "Define the goal first" — strategy-first approach to partnerships
- Shared additional docs and images late into the evening
- Topics covered: quoting workflows, competitive positioning, identity framework

## System Setup
- SolveWorks deployment completed by Dwayne
- All cron jobs active: morning briefing, competitive intel, opportunity scan, security check
- Mission Control dashboard live at solveworks.io/darryl/
- Tailscale connected, remote access operational
- Power settings configured for 24/7 operation
